attributes.action: ban agricultural machinery from public roads during peak travel times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ban agricultural vehicles such as tractors, combine harvesters and horse boxes from being on public roads between 7 - 9am and 4 - 6pm.  These vehicles cause large traffic queues and do not need to be on the road at these times.  When we are trying to prevent national gridlock, the banning of slow vehicles should be mandatory.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
